testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlOrganizationInformationRequest dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.2 [Need to Provide Information on Organizations, Centers, and Contacts] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Organization Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.2.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N4R15_Send_Organization_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N4R15_Send_Organization_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication - Organization Information (AuthOrg) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.4.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R20_Authentication___Organization_Information__AuthOrg__Supported = ${TMDD_N4R20_Authentication___Organization_Information__AuthOrg__Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier - Organization Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.4.2.1.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R21_Operator_Identifier___Organization_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R21_Operator_Identifier___Organization_Information_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Owner Organization Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.4.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R22_Owner_Organization_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R22_Owner_Organization_Identifier_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Owner Center Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.4.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R23_Owner_Center_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R23_Owner_Center_Identifier_Supported}
Step 7 CONFIGURE: Define the response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: ResponseMessage: ${ResponseMessage}
Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 9 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 10 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 11 CONFIGURE: Identify the Operator Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OperatorID: ${OperatorID}
Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT is expected to have valid data available for a response message in this test. RECORD this information as: DataValid: ${DataValid}

Step 16 REQUEST-RESPONSE-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N4R15_Send_Organization_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password OPERATORID = OperatorID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected DATAVALID = DataValid

Step 17 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 17.1 VERIFY that an organizationInformationRequestMsg message was received.
Step 17.2 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message organizationInformationRequestMsg.
Step 17.3 VERIFY that an organization-information-type data element exists within message organizationInformationRequestMsg.
Step 17.4 IF TMDD_N4R20_Authentication___Organization_Information__AuthOrg__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.4.1 VERIFY that an authentication data frame exists within message organizationInformationRequestMsg.
Step 17.5 IF TMDD_N4R21_Operator_Identifier___Organization_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.5.1 VERIFY that an operator-id data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationRequestMsg.authentication
Step 17.6 IF TMDD_N4R22_Owner_Organization_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.6.1 VERIFY that an organization-id data element exists within message organizationInformationRequestMsg.
Step 17.7 IF TMDD_N4R23_Owner_Center_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.7.1 VERIFY that a center-id-list data frame exists within message organizationInformationRequestMsg.
Step 17.8 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 17.9 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 17.10 POSTCONDITION: REQUEST-RESPONSE-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N4R15_Send_Organization_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED RESPONSEMESSAGE = ResponseMessage
Step 18 EXIT
